short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind yourself which companies are contributing to/affiliated with Israel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension inserts symbols beside the names of companies that contribute to Israel's economy, keeping you aware of such companies especially for online shopping.
